item.title: Ubuntu系统编译Bigtop
item.description: 1. 安装系统依赖 系统更新并安装新的包 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y cmake git-core git-svn subversion checkinstall build-essential dh-make debhelper ant ant-optional autoconf automake liblzo2-dev libzip-dev sharutils libfuse-dev reprepro libtool libssl-dev asciidoc xmlto ssh curl sudo apt-get install -y devscripts sudo apt-get build-dep pkg-config 安装Sun JDK 6
